thread.title: BRIEF-BP Midstream Partners Says Revenues For 3 Months Ended Dec 31, 2017 Were $27.6 Mln

title: BRIEF-BP Midstream Partners Says Revenues For 3 Months Ended Dec 31, 2017 Were $27.6 Mln

organizations.name: midstream partners says revenues for 3 months ended

text: Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-BP Midstream Partners Says Revenues For 3 Months Ended Dec 31, 2017 Were $27.6 Mln Reuters Staff March 22 (Reuters) - Bp Midstream Partners Lp: * BP MIDSTREAM PARTNERS LP - REVENUES FOR THREE MONTHS ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017 WERE $27.6 MILLION * BP MIDSTREAM PARTNERS LP - QTRLY NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO THE PARTNERSHIP PER LIMITED PARTNER UNIT $0.21 Source text : ( bit.ly/2IJwj1F ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
